Revenge Done. Rohit Sharma's favorite bowlers are Malinga, Strac, Archer, Boult, Rabada. Their ball was smashed by Rohit Sharma. Travis Head is a rubbish player and how he scored a century with India. Afghanistan's bowlers dismissed Head but India's bowlers could not.

India might have won the World Cup if Rishab Panth was there instead of Suriya. But unfortunately Rishab pant was not there in the World Cup because of the injury.

God the Creator wanted Australia to win the World Cup. This does not mean that Australia is a strong team. India is much stronger than Australia. If Rohit Sharma had played with a little understanding, he could have scored a century, if Virat Kohli had scored a century, if they could have formed a long partnership, then maybe India would have won the World Cup. Bhumrah, Shami, Siraj all bowled well from the start, but could not finish well. If Bhumrah had bowled Travis Head then India would have won the World Cup by 240 runs.
